code: import React,{Component}from'react';import classNames from'classnames';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import OutlineButton from'components/Common/outline-button';import PrimaryTitle from'components/Common/primary-title';import Selector from'components/Common/selector';const items={exit:'Мiсце виходу',house:'Ваш будинок',org:'Органiзацiя',start:'Аеропорт'};export default class Spawn extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={jail:false,houses:[],selectedHouse:0,exit:true,house:false,start:false,org:false};}componentDidMount(){this.setState(()=>this.props.location.state);}selectSpawn(type){const{houses,selectedHouse}=this.state;rpc.callServer('Spawn-SelectType',[type,houses[selectedHouse]]);rpc.callClient('Browser-HidePage');}selectHouse(house){this.setState(state=>({selectedHouse:state.houses.indexOf(house)}));}render(){const{jail,houses,selectedHouse}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"spawn"},Object.entries(items).map(_ref=>{let[name,title]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classNames('spawn_item',"spawn_item--".concat(name),{disabled:jail&&name!=='exit'||!this.state[name]}),key:name},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(PrimaryTitle,{className:"spawn_title"},title),name==='house'&&/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Selector,{className:"spawn_selector",title:"\u0412\u0438\u0431\u0435\u0440i\u0442\u044C \u0443 \u044F\u043A\u043E\u043C\u0443 \u0437'\u044F\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0438\u0441\u044F",circleButton:true,items:houses,value:houses[selectedHouse],onChange:this.selectHouse.bind(this)}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(OutlineButton,{className:"spawn_submit",onClick:this.selectSpawn.bind(this,name)},"\u0423\u0432i\u0439\u0442\u0438"));}));}}
